name: Fair Play
description:
Description

The fair is in town and that can only mean one thing: opportunity. Take your chance in this charming arcade game. Roll the dice and manipulate it. We would not want it to be fair, would we? But be wary as the suspicion rises. You will risk being detected.

Created for the 2022 GMTK game jam

Controls Keys Action SPACE Throw Dice E Slow motion Left Click - Drag - Release Change rotation Highscores

Trouer (DEV) - 15
Wofke (DEV) - 10
steineman (DEV) - 2
